project_descr: The project aims to strengthen the capacity of national and sub-national institutions to effectively coordinate and implement development plans.

outputs.output_descr: The overall aim of this project is to strengthen the capacity of Ministry of Finance and Economic Cooperation and its regional counterparts to effectively coordinate and implement development programmes and projects.
donor_name: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS

outputs.output_descr: This project aims at strengthening the capacity of the National Planning Commission to fulfill its functions and responsibilities.
